title: Melody Day ask for a 'Kiss on the Lips' in new MV teaser! | allkpop.com
text: Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Melody Day ask for a 'Kiss on the Lips' in new MV teaser! By elliefilet 16 minutes ago 1,699 171 2 0 Google+ Melody Day are asking for a " Kiss on the Lips " in their new music video teaser!The girl group are bringing some warmth to the cold season with an island-themed concept and MV for their 2nd mini album. Though they've been known for their ballads, it sounds like "Kiss on the Lips" is something upbeat.Check out the MV teaser above, and stay tuned for the full release on February 15! YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
